introduction.purpose: to integrate 3 faculties databases providing a web interface for users to access and manage the integrated inventory
introduction.scope: the iufa application provides a web-based interface for users to access and manage the integrated inventory

system_overview.description: the unified university inventory system is a web-based application that allows users to access and manage the integrated inventory

system_requirements: the system must authorize user actions
the system must update the inventory in real-time

performance: the system must be available at all times during working hours
the system must respond to user requests within 1 minute
security: all user actions must be authenticated and authorized
the system must protect user data from unauthorized access
usability: the system must be easy to use for users with basic internet and office experience
the system must provide clear and consistent terminology

constraints: the system must be installed on a microsoft or unix platform
the system must be available at all times during working hours
the system must respond to user requests within 1 minute
